articles.author: Joshua Franklin, Sam Jones
articles.title: UBS appoints Iqbal Khan as sole head of wealth management unit - Financial Times
articles.description: Tom Naratil leaves Swiss lender after 39 years as Naureen Hassan joins to lead Americas division
articles.content: UBS has appointed Iqbal Khan as the sole head of its flagship wealth management division in a management reshuffle that strengthens his chances of taking over as chief executive of the Swiss bank in … [+2795 chars]

articles.author: Sumathi Bala
articles.title: Japan PM lacks 'political capital' to revise post-war constitution despite election win, analyst says - CNBC
articles.description: The prime minister is unlikely to make any real movement on that front soon, said Tobias Harris, senior fellow for Asia at the Center for American Progress.
articles.content:
Voters cast a ballot at a polling location in the Minato District of Tokyo, Japan, on Sunday, July 10, 2022.
Japan's Prime Minister Fumio Kishida doesn't appear to have the "political capital" to re… [+3243 chars]
